attributes.action: Improve the ADHD medication shortage for those who are being impacted
attributes.additional_details: I think it’s the responsibility of the government and parliament to protect its people and society. This particular case is having a massive impact on a proportion of that society.
attributes.background:
Improve the ADHD medication shortage for those who are being impacted by lack of medication stock in the UK. 

There doesn’t seem to be much communication around a resolution to improve stock shortages which is significantly impacting people’s lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Hold a Public Inquiry into the shortage of ADHD medication
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650973
